entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WATCH , Owen Sound
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:04 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this morning. Flurries at times heavy beginning early this afternoon. Risk of snow squalls this afternoon. Local blowing snow this afternoon. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 this afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 9 this morning and minus 18 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few flurries. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local blowing snow. Local amount 5 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 overnight. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
